Trails.Name: Lower Wanderer, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Old Log Rd, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Sun Bowl, Home Run, 91, Main Base Area

_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
12/3 2:36PM - Thank you Mother Nature! Todays conditions were stellar and it's just going to keep getting better from here. We have added 6 new trails into the mix today including Upper and Lower Drifter, Upper and Lower East Meadow, Lower Liftline, and Interstate. We now have over 100 acres of skiable terrain! Tomorrow our trail count will be 23 with 19 set to be smoothed overnight. The Gondola, American Express, Ursa Express, Snow Bowl Express, and Theodore Carpet are all set to spin at 9am with the possibility of wind delays. You can also expect snow showers with accumulations of 1-2 inches during the day.

With the new foot of snow, we expect to see plenty more trails come online before the weekend. Cold temperatures will hold through the week allowing our snowmaking team to continue to push for terrain expansion. Stay tuned to the Mountain Report for the most up-to-date information.

For those of you who cant wait for the parks to open, check out the lower portion of Frank's Fall Line! Our Parks crew has set a 3 feature pop-up park, including 2 boxes and 1 tube, ready to hold you over while they eye their next build.

See you in the morning!


Safety Tip: Please stay out of closed terrain, failure to abide risks losing your pass.

The last day to buy an Ikon pass is December 11. Buy Now before its too late! With 60+ destinations worldwide, you can explore winter to its fullest, from backyard missions to bucket list dreams.

Uphill travel is open! You must get a pass from guest services and read the policy online. Please keep in mind that there are designated travel routes with or without snow.

Time to lock in on your winter fun! Enroll in a high-performance adventure this season. This winter, accelerate your ability level through guided seasonal programs and specialty workshops with the Stratton Mountain Sports School. Seasonal Programs are the best way to turn your little one into a lifetime skier or snowboarder, with a strong foundation of skills, in a discipline they enjoy most. Seasonal Programs focus on fun at an early age, followed by specialty disciplines such as freestyle skiing and snowboarding, ski racing, freeriding, and more. These programs are offered for all ages, including adults, so it's never too late to join!

Stay and relish the Green Mountains! Stratton Real Estate is here to help with all your real estate needs. Make your sweet escape a reality.

Reliable cars are the name of the game; that is why we trust Oliver Subaru and Ford. Made for all seasons and all families, check out Oliver Ford and Oliver Subaru for year-round reliability!
